content:
Hello all,
I'm a FHIR newbie - and I'm diving in for a project that hopes to implement FHIR on a blockchain. Specifically, we're deriving our inspiration from this academic paper: https://www.dre.vanderbilt.edu/~schmidt/PDF/FHIRChain-jnca.pdf

Has anyone here pursued this? Does it seem feasible?

Thanks for any feedback,
Cory

There's actually a whole stream devoted to #blockchain - you might look there for ideas/discussion. (Where you'll quickly learn that there's a significant gap between 'feasible' and 'consensus about what's practical/a good idea' :))
